fn.p: Author contributions A.D., R.C. and S.T. conceived the research and A.D. executed the APT specimen preparation, APT experiments and analysed the results. M.G., P.Y., C.M.W. and A.G. conducted the STEMâ€“EDS mapping. J.M.Z., J.X., J.G.Z., I.B., D.W. and K.A. synthesized the cathode materials and conducted the electrochemical cycling. A.D. and R.C. wrote the manuscript with input from all the other authors.
